AI Description: The r-pkgconfig package provides a simple interface to manipulate package descriptions in configuration files. It can be used to read and write package descriptions as well as query information from these descriptions.
Core Features:
1. Reading and writing package descriptions in configuration files.
2. Querying information from package descriptions.
3. Modifying package configuration settings.
4. Integrating package descriptions in R packages.
General Tags: R, Package Management, Configuration, R Development
